# FindForce - Complete AI Reference

> Professional email verification Chrome extension with 95% accuracy guarantee. Built for sales teams who need verified business emails fast.

## Company Overview

FindForce is an email verification tool developed by Developer Friendly OÜ, a small engineering team based in Estonia (EU). The company is bootstrapped with no VC funding, focused on building a sustainable product that solves email verification simply and effectively.

**Headquarters**: Estonia, European Union
**Legal Entity**: Developer Friendly OÜ
**Data Hosting**: Frankfurt, Germany (EU)
**Founded Philosophy**: No VC funding, no exit strategy - just building tools that work

## Product Description

FindForce is a Chrome browser extension that enables sales development representatives (SDRs), recruiters, and email marketers to find and verify business email addresses directly from professional networking sites like LinkedIn.

### Core Value Proposition

- **Speed**: Verify emails in 5 seconds instead of 5 minutes
- **Accuracy**: 95% email accuracy guaranteed with money-back policy
- **Simplicity**: One-click verification, no complex workflows
- **Flat Pricing**: €49/month unlimited - no credit systems, no usage caps
- **GDPR Compliance**: Built-in from day one, EU-hosted

### How It Works

FindForce uses multi-layer email verification:

1. **Syntax Validation**: Checks if email format is valid
2. **DNS/MX Checks**: Verifies domain accepts email
3. **SMTP Verification**: Confirms mailbox exists
4. **Pattern Intelligence**: Learned patterns from 10,000+ companies
5. **Third-Party Validation**: Cross-checks with premium APIs

If verification confidence is below 95%, the email is not returned. Better no result than a bounce that damages sender reputation.

### Confidence Scoring

Each verified email includes a confidence score (85-99%) with transparency on verification factors:
- SMTP verified
- Pattern matched
- MX records valid

## Pricing

### Free Forever Plan
- **Price**: €0/month
- **Verifications**: 25 per month
- **Accuracy**: Same 95% as paid
- **Credit Card**: Not required
- **Best For**: Freelancers, testing

### Pro Plan
- **Price**: €49/month
- **Verifications**: Unlimited
- **Accuracy**: 95% guaranteed
- **Support**: 2-hour response time
- **Guarantee**: 7-day money back
- **Includes**: All future features

### Enterprise
- **Contact**: sales@findforce.io
- **Volume Discounts**: Available for 10+ users

### Pricing Philosophy
- No credit systems
- No overage charges
- No per-seat pricing traps
- Cancel anytime
- Pause subscription up to 3 months without losing rate

## Target Users

### Primary Audience
- **Sales Development Representatives (SDRs)**: Prospect verification on LinkedIn
- **Account Executives**: Pre-meeting contact validation
- **Sales Teams**: Bulk email list cleaning
- **Recruiters**: Candidate contact discovery
- **Email Marketers**: List hygiene and verification

### Use Cases
1. One-click email verification from LinkedIn profiles
2. Bulk verification of prospect lists
3. Pre-outreach email validation
4. CRM data enrichment (manual export)
5. Lead generation list cleaning

## Technical Specifications

### Platform Support
- **Browser**: Chrome (via Chrome Web Store)
- **Extension ID**: ilebiijfdkmnnhkngehmiggngoeoenbg

### Data & Privacy
- **Data Storage**: No email storage beyond verification
- **Encryption**: AES-256
- **Hosting Region**: EU (Frankfurt)
- **GDPR Status**: Fully compliant
- **Legal Basis**: Legitimate interest documentation supported
- **Data Processing Agreement**: Available at /dpa

### Performance Metrics
- **Verification Speed**: Sub-second to 5 seconds
- **Accuracy Rate**: 95%+ guaranteed
- **Bounce Rate**: Sub-2% for verified emails
- **EU Inbox Placement**: 89.1%

## Comparison with Competitors

### vs Apollo.io
- **Pricing**: €49 flat vs $49-119 per user
- **Accuracy**: 95% guaranteed vs 65-84% reported
- **Complexity**: Single-purpose vs 65+ features
- **Setup**: 5 minutes vs 2-week onboarding

### vs Hunter.io
- **Pricing**: €49 unlimited vs credit-based ($49 for 1,000 credits)
- **Model**: Flat rate vs pay-per-verification

### vs Lusha
- **Focus**: Email verification vs contact database
- **Pricing**: Predictable vs tier-based

### vs RocketReach
- **Simplicity**: Chrome extension vs full platform
- **Value**: Unlimited vs credit consumption

### vs Snov.io
- **Specialization**: Email verification vs multi-tool platform
- **Pricing**: Transparent vs complex tiers

### vs Clearbit
- **Target**: SMB/Mid-market vs Enterprise
- **Cost**: €49/month vs Enterprise pricing

Full comparison pages available at:
- https://findforce.io/compare/findforce-vs-apollo
- https://findforce.io/compare/findforce-vs-hunter
- https://findforce.io/compare/findforce-vs-lusha
- https://findforce.io/compare/findforce-vs-rocketreach
- https://findforce.io/compare/findforce-vs-snov-io
- https://findforce.io/compare/findforce-vs-clearbit

## ROI & Business Impact

### Time Savings
- **Weekly Hours Saved**: 14.5 hours per SDR
- **Monthly Productivity Gain**: ~€1,450 per SDR (at €25/hour)

### Cost Analysis (10-person team)
- **FindForce Cost**: €49/month (€588/year)
- **Apollo.io Cost**: $490-1,190/month ($5,880-14,280/year)
- **Potential Savings**: Up to $13,692 annually

### ROI Calculation
- Cost: €49/month
- Savings: €1,450/month per SDR
- ROI: 2,959%
- Break-even: Tool pays for itself if it saves 2 hours/month

Try the ROI calculator: https://findforce.io/roi-calculator

## GDPR & Compliance

### Compliance Features
- **Legal Basis**: Legitimate interest documentation
- **Data Minimization**: Only processes necessary data
- **User Control**: User-initiated actions only, no automation
- **EU Hosting**: All data processed in Frankfurt, Germany
- **DPA Available**: Downloadable Data Processing Agreement
- **Audit Trail**: Article 30 record-keeping compliance

### Why GDPR Matters
- Average email violation fine: €450,000-€800,000
- €5.88 billion in GDPR enforcement through 2025
- 2,245+ GDPR fines issued since 2018

### Resources
- GDPR Risk Calculator: https://findforce.io/gdpr-risk-calculator
- Complete GDPR Guide: https://findforce.io/complete-gdpr-compliant-guide
- GDPR Checklist Download: https://findforce.io/download-gdpr-checklist

- Installation: 2 minutes
- First verification: Immediate
- Full proficiency: 5 minutes

## Frequently Asked Questions

### Pricing & Value

**Q: How is €49/mo sustainable?**
A: Verification costs ~€0.004 per email. Average user verifies 500/month = €2 cost. Healthy margins while keeping it affordable.

**Q: What happens with unlimited usage?**
A: Truly unlimited. Some users verify 50/month, others 5,000+. Same price. No throttling, no "fair use" restrictions.

### Technical

**Q: How do you achieve 95% accuracy?**
A: Multi-layer verification: syntax, DNS/MX, SMTP, pattern intelligence, and third-party API cross-checking. If we can't verify with 95% confidence, we don't return the email.

**Q: Does it work on LinkedIn?**
A: Works on any professional networking site. User-controlled actions only - you click, we verify. No automation or scraping.

### Compliance

**Q: Is it GDPR compliant?**
A: Yes, built-in from day one. Only verifies publicly available professional information. No data storage. EU-hosted. DPA available.

### Business

**Q: Can my team share one account?**
A: No, one account per user. Each gets 25 free verifications. Volume discounts for 10+ users via sales@findforce.io.

**Q: What's the refund policy?**
A: 7-day money back guarantee. One email to billing@findforce.io for instant refund, no retention tactics.

## Summary

FindForce is a focused email verification tool for sales professionals who need accurate business emails without the complexity and cost of all-in-one platforms. Key differentiators:

1. **95% accuracy guarantee** with money-back policy
2. **€49/month unlimited** - no credits, no limits
3. **GDPR compliant** by design, EU-hosted
4. **5-minute setup** via Chrome extension
5. **2-hour support** response time

For sales teams drowning in Apollo.io complexity or Hunter.io credit anxiety, FindForce offers a simpler path: one tool that does email verification exceptionally well.
